[bq="HJSDGCE"]Why is it when you reach a good age, parents start provoking their kids into marriage and starting a family and stuff? What if I want to get married when I'm 30 or 35? What's wrong with that?[/bq]
Because they don't want a 30-35 grow up adult man in their house.
He has enough age to have his own house, a decent job and family

"@Shadow the Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/554816836368721e622f0100#post_554816836368721e622f0100

Not that having a family is bad so don't misinterpret it like that.

I mean, I want to live in a apartment!
